Stay productive and healthy with regular break reminders!
Do you find yourself working for hours without taking a break? Take a Break Reminder helps you maintain a healthy work routine by reminding you to take regular breaks, refresh, and get back to work with renewed focus.

Key Features:

🕒 Customizable Break Intervals: Set your preferred break interval (e.g., 25 minutes) to receive reminders when it’s time to step away from your screen.
⏳ Built-in Break Timer: Track your break time with a countdown timer. The extension automatically opens a timer in a new tab to help you take a break and stay productive.
🔔 Break Notifications: Get notified when it's time to take a break with desktop alerts. No more missed reminders!
⚙️ Easy to Use: Simple, lightweight, and intuitive interface that seamlessly integrates into your daily routine.
📊 Productivity Boost: Improve focus and reduce burnout by taking regular breaks. The Pomodoro technique, integrated with the extension, helps you achieve more with less stress.
Why Use Take a Break Reminder?

🌟 Stay Healthy: Regular breaks can improve posture, reduce eye strain, and boost your overall well-being.
💪 Boost Productivity: Structured breaks help refresh your mind, allowing you to return to your work with increased concentration and energy.
🧠 Better Focus: Taking short breaks helps prevent burnout and ensures you stay mentally sharp throughout your workday.
Whether you’re working from home, in the office, or studying for exams, Take a Break Reminder is your perfect companion to improve productivity and well-being.
